articles.title: North America's oldest dinosaur is completely rewriting history - Earth.com
articles.description: Researchers discovered Ahvaytum bahndooiveche fossils in Wyoming, revealing dinosaurs in Laurasia earlier than believed.
articles.content:
Have you ever wondered how and when the fascinating era of dinosaurs began? For decades, paleontologists have been debating this question, armed mostly with fragmented fossil records and theories. 
… [+5683 chars]
